name: Music Jam (Kartikeya Saxena)
description: This is my first-time GameJam participation.  Use WSAD keys to move your character, F to switch gravity, and SPACE to shoot. Bullets are only available for 5 seconds when you take a power-up (Green Cylinders). If in the Blue Enemy bubble, the enemy will chase you down. Enemies will spawn in waves with an increasing number of enemies in each wave.
